Package productionline

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    The Item interface declares methods to be implemented in the Product class.
    MultimediaControl
    Interface MultimediaControl declares methods used in MoviePlayer.
    ScreenSpec
    ScreenSpec interface declares methods used in the Screen class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    Extends the Product class to add functionality specific to Audio devices.
    Controller
    JavaFX Controller.
    DbHandler
    This class handles database fundtions such as starting/stopping the database and executing queries.
    Employee
    This class is used to store and generate user information.
    Main
    Main class.
    MoviePlayer
    MoviePlayer class extends the Product class to add functionality specific to movie players.
    Product
    Product class holds product objects containing the products type, manufacturer, and name.
    ProductionRecord
    Class to hold ProductionRecord Objects and their attributes.
    Screen
    Class Screen holds Screen objects, their attributes, and implements methods declared in the ScreenSpec interface.
    Widget  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemType
    Creates an enum to hold the different Item types and their respective code.
    MonitorType
    enum to hold all of the possible monitor types.
